item.title: uchie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: uchie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: uchie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: uchie add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "jika anda memiliki kesempatan mendapatkan cinta pertama di sebuah toko kelontong, meskipun toko itu bobrok dan bau tengik, maka rebutlah cepat-cepat kesempatan itu, karena cinta semacam itu bisa menjadi demikian indah tak terperikan! " -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: uchie add a quote by dee
item.description: "Seindah apa pun huruf terukir, dapatkah ia bermakna apabila tak ada jeda? Dapatkan ia dimengerti jika tak ada spasi? Bukankah kita baru bisa bergerak jika ada jarak? Dan saling menyayang bila ada ruang?" -- dee

item.title: uchie add a quote by Michael H. Hart
item.description: "My choice of Muhammad to lead the list of the world's most influential persons may surprise some readers and may be questioned by others, but he was the only man in history who was supremely successful on both the religious and secular level." -- Michael H. Hart

item.title: uchie add a quote by Ayu Utami
item.description: "Jika kebetulan terjadi terlalu banyak, apakah kamu percaya bahwa itu tidak bermakna?" -- Ayu Utami

item.title: uchie add a quote by Mia Arsjad
item.description: "Kamu harus yakin, when you meet an ending, it's just because you're going to meet a new start." -- Mia Arsjad
